name: Zep AI
headline: The Memory Foundation For Your AI Stack
description:
Build AI assistants that continually learn and delight users with personalized and accurate experiences. 

## Memory that learns from your users
Zep intelligently learns from user interactions, improving your assistant or agent's knowledge over time. Recall user facts in milliseconds, with Zep adding no latency to your prompt creation.

## Ready for Production and Scale
- Granular Memory Controls: Go beyond semantic search with developer-defined rubrics for user fact relevance. 
- Comprehensive APIs and SDKs: Python, TypeScript, and Go SDKs, with full CRUD control of stored facts.
- SOC 2 and tools for Privacy Compliance.

## Build Consistent and Correct LLM Apps
Zep's Structured Output and Dialog Classification tools build on Zep's memory enabling you to build more accurate and consistent user experiences.

- Extract strongly-typed data from chat history, quickly & accurately: Go beyond your LLM provider's JSON or Structured Output mode with built-in types for datetimes, floats, emails, RegEx patterns, and more.
- Instantly classify conversation state: Understand user intent and emotion, segment users, and more.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:infrastructure; industry:ai; industry:conversational-ai; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Daniel Chalef, Founder
founders.description:
Founder, Zep AI. Engineer turned startup founder (previously KnowledgeTree) and late-stage operator (SparkPost acquired MessageBird), with detours as a Data Science, Marketing, and Corp Dev guy. 

Still an engineer at heart and have a soft spot for Go.

# The Foundational Memory Layer for AI
Equip your agents with the knowledge to complete tasks, from the mundane to monumental.
[Sign Up](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/app.getzep.com/api/auth/register>)[How it works](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/671031e8b541df1ce2c4bd41_hero_visual.png)
Trusted by:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67158d9adeb73dcf3205c45e_mattle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67158d9a1d464cb83ade255f_webMD.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67158d9aa9e4b0454b74d9dd_flockx.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67158d9a81737b2fff47a53f_Athena.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67158d9a347c97fdae35ff60_college-journey.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67158d9a6c8985495cdb574f_jiffy.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67158d9acdd7174a21069930_axialent.png)
### Build Personalized & Accurate AI Agents
## Memory that learns from users & business data
  * Send Zep a stream of chat messages & business data
  * Zep intelligently fuses data on a Knowledge Graph
  * Provide your agent accurate and relevant user facts with a single API call


[See it in action](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)
Easily Drop into LangChain
Zep's ChatHistory class makes production-ready personalization simple for any LangChain Expression Language or LangGraph app.
### Enable Agent Temporal Reasoning
## Memory that updates as facts change
  * As Zep incorporates new information, superseded facts are marked as invalid
  * Zep identifies and stores temporal context on the graph
  * Retaining a history of facts enables agents to reason with changing user state


[See it in action](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)
Easily Drop into LangChain
Zep's ChatHistory class makes production-ready personalization simple for any LangChain Expression Language or LangGraph app.
## [Zep is the State of the Art in Agent MemoryZep is the current state-of-the-art in agent memory, excelling in the LongMemEval benchmark, a challenging evaluation that closely models enterprise use cases. Zep shows an aggregate accuracy improvement of up to 18.5% over the baseline, and 100% improvements for many individual evaluations. All while simultaneously reducing response latency by 90%.![Paper preview.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/679722fb50c1dbc73db90994_Long%20mem.png)Read The Paper](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/blog.getzep.com/state-of-the-art-agent-memory/>)
[![Kesher Williams \(Slalom\) on Agent Memory with Zep](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/img/placeholder-thumb.svg)](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)[![Kesher Williams \(Slalom\) on Agent Memory with Zep](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6720fd49425e367c9ec40a97/67932d8171e6148615aa98a3_kesha.png)](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7275144595913555969/>)
## [Kesher Williams (Slalom) on Agent Memory with Zep](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7275144595913555969/>)
[![Nikki Siapno \(Canva\) on building an Agent with Zep](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/img/placeholder-thumb.svg)](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)[![Nikki Siapno \(Canva\) on building an Agent with Zep](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6720fd49425e367c9ec40a97/6793282b6f8bc669b79a2535_1736753809964.png)](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7284473486956212224/>)
## [Nikki Siapno (Canva) on building an Agent with Zep](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7284473486956212224/>)
"Zep just introduced a game-changing way for AI agents to remember and learn. Unlike other systems that only retrieve static documents, Zep uses a temporal knowledge graph to combine conversations and structured business data, keeping track of how things change over time."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6720fd49425e367c9ec40a97/67b23e53e70b867a63807bb1_1726623652705.jpeg)
Lior Sinclair
[](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7287958207971434496>)
Founder/CEO, AlphaSignal
"Zep is one of the most exciting things I've seen for real-world agent use cases in a long time. Their innovative approach is truly game-changing."
![Ken Collins](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6720fd49425e367c9ec40a97/679c0a3e062a7ab2684a26ce_1720885799973.jpeg)
Ken Collins
[](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/metaskills/>)
VP of Product, Torq and GenAI Expert
"Zep AI was instrumental in enabling the Sidekick’s personalized experience through dynamic memory retrieval. Their innovative tech stack is powering groundbreaking projects like ArtPrize 2024, taking personalized AI experiences to the next level."
![Mark Losey](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6720fd49425e367c9ec40a97/679c0c5c8201fac856f07f3c_1725418364100.jpeg)
Mark Losey
[](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/markalosey/>)
CTO at Flockx
"Zep AI empowers AI systems to think and remember like humans. By organizing memories into structured episodes and extracting key insights, it builds smarter, more intuitive AI agents that revolutionize how businesses harness intelligence."
![Vijay Morampudi](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6720fd49425e367c9ec40a97/679c065c583b7aab3c47ee2c_1704623838153.jpeg)
Vijay Morampudi
[](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/vijaymorampudi/?originalSubdomain=in>)
Senior Director - AI CoE, Axtria
## Ready for Enterprise Production and Scale
### Instant Memory Retrieval
Get relevant results from memory in milliseconds. Scale to millions of users with ease.
### Granular Memory Controls
Tailor memory extraction and relevance with custom rating frameworks and controls.
[](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)
### SOC 2 Type 2 and Privacy Compliance
Be assured with [SOC 2 Type II compliance](https://www.getzep.com/<https:/trust.getzep.com/>). Zep also offers privacy controls to support CCPA and GDPR compliance.
[](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)
## Add Agent Memory in Minutes
With minimal code changes, enable your agent with rich, relevant context from chat and business data.
[Python](https://www.getzep.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[TypeScript](https://www.getzep.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Go](https://www.getzep.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
```
 

    ![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64889d1417f36c1e9731bb2c/66cb0f42609ab9d86273fa35_copy.svg)
   
# Add a chat message to the graph
await zep_client.memory.add(session_id, messages=[
	Message(role="Jane", role_type="user", content="I can't log in!")
])
# Add business data to the graph
await zep_client.graph.add(user_id=user_id, type="json", data={"account_status": "suspended"})
# get memory relevant to the current conversation
memory = zep_client.memory.get(session_id="session_id")
print(memory.context)
"""FACTS and ENTITIES represent relevant context to the current conversation.
# These are the most relevant facts and their valid date ranges
# format: FACT (Date range: from - to)
<FACTS>
 - Emily is experiencing issues with logging in. (2024-11-14 02:13:19+00:00 - present) 
 - Emily's account has a suspended status due to payment failure. (2024-11-14 02:03:58+00:00 - present) 
...
</FACTS>"""
 


```

```
 

    ![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64889d1417f36c1e9731bb2c/66cb0f42609ab9d86273fa35_copy.svg)
   
// Add a chat message to the graph
await zepClient.memory.add("session_id", [
  { role: "Jane", roleType: "user", content: "I can't log in!" }
]);
// Add business data to the graph
await zepClient.graph.add(userId, "json", { account_status: "suspended" });
// Get memory relevant to the current conversation
const memory = await zepClient.memory.get("session_id");
console.log(memory.context);
```
FACTS and ENTITIES represent relevant context to the current conversation.
# These are the most relevant facts and their valid date ranges
# format: FACT (Date range: from - to)
<FACTS>
 - Emily is experiencing issues with logging in. (2024-11-14 02:13:19+00:00 - present) 
 - Emily's account has a suspended status due to payment failure. (2024-11-14 02:03:58+00:00 - present) 
...
</FACTS>
```
 


```

```
 

    ![Copy](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64889d1417f36c1e9731bb2c/66cb0f42609ab9d86273fa35_copy.svg)
   
client.Memory.Add(context.TODO(), "sessionId", &v2.AddMemoryRequest{
	Messages: []*v2.Message{{Content: "I can't log in!", RoleType: v2.RoleTypeUser}},
})
client.Graph.Add(context.TODO(), &v2.AddDataRequest{
	UserId: userID, Type: "json", Data: map[string]interface{}{"account_status": "suspended"},
})
memory, _ := zepClient.Memory.Get(context.TODO(), "session_id")
fmt.Println(memory.Context)
```
FACTS and ENTITIES represent relevant context to the current conversation.
# These are the most relevant facts and their valid date ranges
# format: FACT (Date range: from - to)
<FACTS>
 - Emily is experiencing issues with logging in. (2024-11-14 02:13:19+00:00 - present) 
 - Emily's account has a suspended status due to payment failure. (2024-11-14 02:03:58+00:00 - present) 
...
</FACTS>
```
 


```

## Framework and Platform Agnostic
Develop agents in Python, TypeScript, or Go - with any framework or none at all.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/67103e102a7ff97d61435962_python%20logo.png)

## Build Consistent and Correct LLM Apps
Build your agent in Python, TypeScript, or Go using your favorite framework, or none at all.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660b1c076d13b7e2967a499d/6710464c9a44be8adad1e74d_screenshot2.png)
### Fast, Flexible Structured Output
## Extract strongly-typed data from chat history, quickly & accurately
Get structured output from chat messages, more accurately and faster than your LLM provider's JSON or Structured Output mode. Zep offers built-in types for datetimes, floats, emails, RegEx patterns, and more.
[See it in action](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)
Fill "Forms"
Build User Profiles
Run Biz Processes
Populate API Calls
### Dialogue Classifier
## Instantly classify conversation state
Understand user intent and emotion, segment users, and more. Route chains based on semantic context, and trigger events. All [without adding latency](https://www.getzep.com/<#speed>) to your user experience.
[See it in action](https://www.getzep.com/<#>)
Understand Intent
Segment Users
Semantic Routers
Trigger Events

    ![Copy⟨24⟩]
   
# Add a chat message to the graph
await zep_client.memory.add(session_id, messages=[
	Message(role="Jane", role_type="user", content="I can't log in!")
])
# Add business data to the graph
await zep_client.graph.add(user_id=user_id, type="json", data={"account_status": "suspended"})
# get memory relevant to the current conversation

print(memory.context)
"""FACTS and ENTITIES represent relevant context to the current conversation.
# These are the most relevant facts and their valid date ranges
# format: FACT (Date range: from - to)
<FACTS>
 - Emily is experiencing issues with logging in. (2024-11-14 02:13:19+00:00 - present) 
 - Emily's account has a suspended status due to payment failure. (2024-11-14 02:03:58+00:00 - present) 
...
</FACTS>"""

]);
// Add business data to the graph
await zepClient.graph.add(userId, "json", { account_status: "suspended" });
// Get memory relevant to the current conversation
const memory = await zepClient.memory.get("session_id");
console.log(memory.context);
```
FACTS and ENTITIES represent relevant context to the current conversation.

<FACTS>

 - Emily's account has a suspended status due to payment failure. (2024-11-14 02:03:58+00:00 - present) 
...
</FACTS>
```
 


```

client.Memory.Add(context.TODO(), "sessionId", &v2.AddMemoryRequest{
	Messages: []*v2.Message{{Content: "I can't log in!", RoleType: v2.RoleTypeUser}},
})
client.Graph.Add(context.TODO(), &v2.AddDataRequest{
	UserId: userID, Type: "json", Data: map[string]interface{}{"account_status": "suspended"},
})
memory, _ := zepClient.Memory.Get(context.TODO(), "session_id")
fmt.Println(memory.Context)
```

### Fast, Flexible Structured Output
## Extract strongly-typed data from chat history, quickly & accurately
Get structured output from chat messages, more accurately and faster than your LLM provider's JSON or Structured Output mode. Zep offers built-in types for datetimes, floats, emails, RegEx patterns, and more.

generated_description:
### Zep AI: Elevating Conversational Experiences

**Company Overview**
Zep AI, founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, is a cutting-edge startup that's part of Y Combinator's Batch W24. With a compact but mighty team of five, they’re on a mission to create "The Memory Foundation For Your AI Stack."

### Core Mission
Zep AI's vision is rooted in enhancing the function of AI assistants, allowing them to continually learn from user interactions to deliver personalized and accurate responses. Unlike traditional models, Zep enables these assistants to develop a memory that adapts and grows with user preferences, ensuring a smoother, more relevant experience.

### Features
- **Memory That Learns**: Zep's unique approach allows AI assistants to recall user facts impressively quickly—often in milliseconds—without slowing down interactions. This learning process is fueled by user interactions, which enrich the AI's knowledge over time.

- **Production-Ready at Scale**: Zep is designed with enterprises in mind. It includes granular memory controls where developers can define how user facts are prioritized, along with comprehensive APIs and SDKs available for Python, TypeScript, and Go, facilitating easy integration.

- **Building Accurate LLM Applications**: Zep's Structured Output capabilities and Dialog Classification tools allow developers to extract highly structured data from conversations quickly. This functionality enhances usability and accuracy beyond what standard LLMs offer.

### Unique Selling Proposition
Zep claims the title of “state-of-the-art” in agent memory, achieving an impressive 18.5% accuracy improvement over baseline evaluations while also significantly reducing response latency by up to 90%. Their temporal knowledge graph allows the system to not just store but actively manage evolving information about user interactions.

### Compliance and Security
Zep adheres to rigorous standards, boasting SOC 2 Type II compliance and privacy controls aligned with CCPA and GDPR, making it a reliable choice for businesses concerned with safeguarding user data.

### Community and Partnerships
Mentored by Garry Tan of Y Combinator, Zep is gaining traction and recognition within the tech community, fostering relationships with notable brands and enterprises aiming to enhance their AI capabilities.

### Conclusion
In a landscape where user expectations for personalized AI experiences are skyrocketing, Zep AI is carving its niche by providing an adaptable, memory-driven framework that not only remembers but learns and grows. If you're looking to elevate your conversational AI stack, Zep is poised to be a compelling partner.

**Website**: [Get Zep AI](https://www.getzep.com/) - Explore their offerings, tutorials, and reliable support to realize the full potential of intelligent automation in your projects.
